Text:
Works on Win7 x 64

To Play:

1) Start Games for Windows Market Place.
No need to login or create account. (Same for Vitual Tennis)
2) Run by clicking F12011Launcher.exe 
3) Hit ESC and wait for few seconds

To Install:

1) Mount
2) Run setup.exe
3) Serial: 11111-11111-11111-11111-11111
4) Copy all the content (crack) from Razor1911 directory (from the mounted image)
